text: Khalifa is a 1976 Hindi film, produced by Jeetendra Luthra and directed by Prakash Mehra. The film stars Randhir Kapoor, Rekha, I. S. Johar, Madan Puri, Pran and Lalita Pawar. ==Plot== Rajender is a conman. He promises his girlfriend marriage after finding out about her pregnancy. He leaves his girlfriend, taking away all her savings. Kamla commits suicide. Kamla's brother Vikram decides to kill Rajendra. Vinod, who is of a good character, now encounters his look-alike Rajendra. Hence, Vinod's life is now in a complicated situation. Eventually, all confusion is solved and the movie leads to a happy ending.http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-features/tp- fridayreview/khalifa-1976/article17317874.ece ==Cast== * Randhir Kapoor... Rajendar / Vinod * Rekha... Rekha * I. S. Johar... Diwan Manoharlal Agnihotri * Pran... Vikram * Lalita Pawar... Ganga Devi * Madan Puri... Dharamdas Sharma * Sonia Sahni... Sweety * Urmila Bhatt... Shanta D. Sharma * Praveen Paul ... Mrs. Agnihotri * Jankidas... Harihar * Hari Shivdasani * Ram Mohan * Arpana Choudhary ... Kamla * Mohan Choti * Lalita Kumari * Vikas Anand * Chaman Puri * Sunder ==Soundtrack== * "Dekh Tujhko Dil Ne Kaha" (Part 1)- Kishore Kumar, Asha Bhosle * "Dekh Tujhko Dil Ne Kaha" (Part 2) - Asha Bhosle, Kishore Kumar * "Dil Machal Raha Hai" - Kishore Kumar, Asha Bhosle * "Tak Dhin Tak" (Part 1) - Kishore Kumar, Manna Dey * "Tak Dhin Tak" (Part 2) - Manna Dey, Kishore Kumar * "Meri Arz Suno Banwari" - Manna Dey ==References== Category:1976 films Category:Indian films Category:1970s Hindi-language films Category:Films directed by Prakash Mehra Category:Films scored by R. D. Burman
